# AIxR


A repository as a [discussion place](https://github.com/teunbrand/ggplot-extension-club/discussions) for extending the ggplot2 R package. 


This repository will accommodate some discussion outside The AIxR meetings and coordination efforts.  Feel free to participate in discussions and be in touch!


Meetings:


```{r, echo = F, results = 'asis'}
tibble::tribble(~ date, ~ presenter, ~ package, ~`special topic`, #~link,
"2025-10-29", "Kyle Walker", "{mapgl}", "spatial [(recording)](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=und3C8NAz68)",
"2025-12-02", "Frank Hull", "{ggpal2}", "AI x coded viz") ->
meetings


t <- tempfile()
readr::write_csv(meetings, t)
readr::write_csv(meetings, "meetings.csv")

library(magrittr)
readLines(t) %>% 
  .[2:length(.)] %>% 
  paste("- ", ., "\n\n") %>% 
  stringr::str_replace_all(",", ", ") %>% 
  stringr::str_remove_all(", NA") %>% 
  cat()
```
